channel.title: - Articles
channel.description: Science and education enthusiast blog. Stories and tutorials about deep learning, reinforcement learning, natural language processing, data visualization and software development.

item.title: Neural Machine Translation With PyTorch
item.description: Recently I did a 3-day workshop about Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing. Clearly 3 days was not enough to cover all topics in this broad field, therefore I decided to create a series of practical tutorials about Neural Machine Translation in PyTorch. In this series I will start with a simple neural translation model and gradually improve it using modern neural methods and techniques. In the first tutorial I will create Ukrainian-German translator with an encoder-decoder model.
